snippet.title: Mega Man World 5 DX teaser trailer (Game Boy Color hack)
snippet.description:
This ASM hack turns the original Mega Man V Game Boy game into a full Game Boy Color game!

Features
* fully colorized game, trying to make it as faithful as possible to NES games
* making the most of CGB double speed mode thus getting rid of almost all slowdown in the original game!
* NES styled pause screen
* some game original code parts rewritten and optimized
* works in real hardware and emulators
* renamed to Mega Man World 5 DX (the original japanese name)

Links
Download: https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/7413/
Discussion: https://www.romhacking.net/forum/index.php?topic=31996.0 !

Hack authors
kensuyjin33 - graphics & palettes
marc_max - coding
